snippet: Sarah Ferguson, 33, was acquitted of murder in the episode at Word of Life Christian Church in upstate New York, during which another half brother was injured....
lead_paragraph: Sarah Ferguson, 33, was acquitted of murder in the episode at Word of Life Christian Church in upstate New York, during which another half brother was injured.

headline.main: Woman Convicted of Manslaughter in Beating of Half Brother at Church
